Module iu.util.crypt.impl
Package iu.crypt

Class JweRecipient

java.lang.Object
iu.crypt.JweRecipient
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.iu.crypt.WebEncryptionRecipient
public class JweRecipient extends Object implements edu.iu.crypt.WebEncryptionRecipient
Represents a recipient of a Jwe encrypted message.

    • agreedUponKey

      byte[] agreedUponKey(edu.iu.crypt.WebEncryption.Encryption encryption, edu.iu.crypt.WebKey recipientPrivateKey)
      Computes the agreed-upon key for the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman algorithm.
      Parameters:
      encryption - content encryption algorithm
      recipientPrivateKey - recipient's private key
      Returns:
      agreed-upon key
      See Also:
      • RFC-7518 JWA Section 4.6
      • RFC-7516 JWE Section 5.1 #3

    • passphraseDerivedKey

      byte[] passphraseDerivedKey(String passphrase)
      Gets the passphrase-derived key to use with PBKDF2 key derivation defined by PKCS#5.
      Parameters:
      passphrase - passphrase
      Returns:
      128-bit derived key data suitable for use with AESWrap

      privateKey - private key
      Returns:
